feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine flexible environment Node.js
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine flexible environment Node.js

entry.content: Support for Node.js 24 runtime is in Preview. Node.js 24 is in the Current release state and enters long-term support (LTS) in October 2025. For more information, see Node.js v24.0.0 (Current) in the Node.js website.
entry.summary: New Node.js runtime now available in preview.
entry.title: Feature: Node.js 24 Runtime
